item.description:
Hey guys,

Nele and I want to celebrate our new apartment by having the German group around for a BBQ! We will set up the badminton net and toss lots of yummy meat and veggies on the grill, I am even going to make my homemade BBQ sauce for those that feel so inclined!

This will be a BYO party - bring your own, for those who don't know - so bring whatever you would like to toss on the grill and drink. We'll try to organize some dessert. I'll also BBQ up some ribs for everyone to share.

Looking at the calendar, I think this will be the only weekend that will work for us in July. Please note, if the weather is not cooperating we may postpone to sometime in August - but you will be informed of this.

We hope to see you all there!
item.name: Brad and Nele BBQ
